data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Header Invoice Report'
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_INV_HEAD_RPT
  as select from    ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_INV_TYP                                     as DocumentType
    inner join      I_BillingDocumentBasic                                     as BillingDocument          on BillingDocument.BillingDocumentType = DocumentType.DocumentType
    left outer join I_CompanyCode                                              as Company                  on Company.CompanyCode = BillingDocument.BillingDocument
    left outer join I_SalesOrganizationText                                    as SalesOrganization        on  SalesOrganization.Language          = $session.system_language
                                                                                                           and SalesOrganization.SalesOrganization = BillingDocument.SalesOrganization
    left outer join I_DistributionChannelText                                  as DistributionText         on  DistributionText.Language            = $session.system_language
                                                                                                           and DistributionText.DistributionChannel = BillingDocument.DistributionChannel
    left outer join I_DivisionText                                             as DivisionText             on  DivisionText.Language = $session.system_language
                                                                                                           and DivisionText.Division = BillingDocument.Division
    left outer join I_BillingDocumentTypeText                                  as BillingDocumentTypeText  on  BillingDocumentTypeText.Language            = $session.system_language
                                                                                                           and BillingDocumentTypeText.BillingDocumentType = BillingDocument.BillingDocumentType
    left outer join I_SalesDocumentPartner                                     as SalesDocumentPartner     on  SalesDocumentPartner.SalesDocument   = BillingDocument.BillingDocument
    // and SalesDocumentPartner.posnr = '000000
                                                                                                           and SalesDocumentPartner.PartnerFunction = 'RE'
    left outer join I_Customer                                                 as kunrg                    on kunrg.Customer = BillingDocument.PayerParty
    left outer join I_Customer                                                 as kunag                    on kunag.Customer = BillingDocument.SoldToParty
    left outer join I_Customer                                                 as kunre                    on kunre.Customer = SalesDocumentPartner.Customer
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T(p_domain_name:'ZETR_D_FLAT') as rfbsk                    on  rfbsk.domain_name = 'RFBSK'
                                                                                                           and rfbsk.language    = $session.system_language
                                                                                                           and rfbsk.value_low   = BillingDocument.AccountingTransferStatus
    left outer join I_CustomerPaymentTermsText                                 as CustomerPaymentTermsText on  CustomerPaymentTermsText.Language             = $session.system_language
                                                                                                           and CustomerPaymentTermsText.CustomerPaymentTerms = BillingDocument.CustomerPaymentTerms
    left outer join zetr_t_r101                                                as ExportDocument           on ExportDocument.filen = ''
{
  key BillingDocument.BillingDocument,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CompanyCodeName' ]
      BillingDocument.CompanyCode,
      @Semantics.text: true
      Company.CompanyCodeName                                                                              as CompanyCodeName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'BillingDocumentTypeName' ]
      BillingDocument.BillingDocumentType,
      BillingDocumentTypeText.BillingDocumentTypeName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'SalesOrganizationName' ]
      BillingDocument.SalesOrganization,
      SalesOrganization.SalesOrganizationName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'DistributionChannelName' ]
      BillingDocument.DistributionChannel,
      DistributionText.DistributionChannelName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'DivisionName' ]
      BillingDocument.Division,
      DivisionText.DivisionName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'PayerPartyName' ]
      BillingDocument.PayerParty,
      cast(concat_with_space(kunrg.OrganizationBPName1, kunrg.OrganizationBPName2, 1) as abap.char( 100 )) as PayerPartyName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'SoldToPartyName' ]
      BillingDocument.SoldToParty,
      cast(concat_with_space(kunag.OrganizationBPName1, kunag.OrganizationBPName2, 1) as abap.char( 100 )) as SoldToPartyName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'kunre_txt' ]
      cast( SalesDocumentPartner.Customer as abap.char( 10 ) )                                             as kunre,
      cast(concat_with_space(kunre.OrganizationBPName1, kunre.OrganizationBPName2, 1) as abap.char( 100 )) as kunre_txt,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      BillingDocument.TotalNetAmount                                                                       as TotalNetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      BillingDocument.TotalTaxAmount,
      BillingDocument.TransactionCurrency,
      BillingDocument.BillingDocumentDate,
      BillingDocument.DocumentReferenceID,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CustomerPaymentTermsName' ]
      BillingDocument.CustomerPaymentTerms,
      CustomerPaymentTermsText.CustomerPaymentTermsName,
      BillingDocument.IncotermsClassification,
      BillingDocument.IncotermsTransferLocation,
      BillingDocument.IncotermsVersion,
      BillingDocument.CreationDate,
      BillingDocument.CreationTime,
      BillingDocument.CreatedByUser,
      BillingDocument.SDDocumentCategory,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'AccountingTransferStatusText' ]
      BillingDocument.AccountingTransferStatus,
      rfbsk.text                                                                                           as AccountingTransferStatusText,
      BillingDocument.BillingDocumentIsCancelled,
      BillingDocument.CancelledBillingDocument,
      BillingDocument.AccountingDocument,
      BillingDocument.FiscalYear,
      ExportDocument.filen                                                                                 as DocumentNumber

}
